section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: CEDIVI is composed by AssoDistil, the Italian Alcohol Association, ADEVIN the Spanish wine Alcohol Association and other single companies from Italy and France. Together they joints about 70 distilleries.
goals__remit: CEDIVI represents almost 70% of wine alcohol distilleries in Europe. Its goal is to protect its producing members and to represent them before both national and international institutions.
